Text.Value: You seem a little confused.
Urrrgh... magga cammara - those pustulent thugs!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cinematic/actor context - the deep gnome sways dizzily
EditorData.NodeContext:
'Magga cammara' pronounced 'Mag-ah cam-ah-rah'. Gnomish exclamation meaning 'by the stones'.
Barcus the deep gnome is suffering some grogginess after spinning on the sail of a windmill for the last while.
EditorData.logicalname: Greeting - Player not Drow or Duergar

Text.Value: You're teasing me now. I'm certain of it.
I'm a deep gnome, you're a drow. You helped me, now you plan to enslave me.
On that note, I bid thee farewell. If we should meet again... well, we will have met again.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He says his goodbyes, turns and walks away

Text.Value: I'm in search of a friend. I fear he's in trouble. He had this locket, see, that I gave him years ago before leaving home.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He talks about the locket but doesn't have it on him to show the player

Text.Value: I walk my path, you walk yours. We may meet again - we may not. Who's to say.
You're free to continue on your way.
I found it around the neck of a thug in the Lower City. It was speckled with blood, my friend nowhere to be found.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He shows his blood-speckled amulet to the player.

Text.Value: You've only met Lolth's drow, it seems.
Is that what you think of drow?
Get on with what?
Leave.
I always help my friends.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looks player up and down judgementally, player should wonder 'is he talking about me?'
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: He hasn't given player the pack yet.

Text.Value: What, then? Torture? Bloodsport? Or perhaps just a good old-fashioned walloping?
Well, get on with it. Whatever you are.
Well - get on with it.

EditorData.NodeContext: Still a little out of sorts after his ordeal spinning on a windmill, now a mixture of resigned and annoyed. He's expecting you to extort him now.

Text.Value: Is that what you think of duergar?
Just like that, I'm sure.
Ignorance is alive and well, it seems! Deep gnomes aren't restricted to the Underdark, you know - I've lived in Baldur's Gate for years.
I'm a deep gnome, you're a grey dwarf. You helped me, now you plan to enslave me.
Wait - you do not look like a surface creature. Why are you here?
You're a little far from home for a deep gnome.
I freed you. A little compensation would be nice.
I'd rather know how you got caught.
I could extort you, if that's what you want.
I always help my friends.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Looks player up and down judgementally, player should wonder 'is he talking about me?';He shows his blood-speckled amulet to the player.
EditorData.InternalNodeContext: He hasn't given player the pack yet.

Text.Value: On that note, I bid thee farewell. If we should meet again... well, we will have met again.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He puts away his blood-speckled amulet

Text.Value: But I still have hope. I have reason to believe he's in the Underdark. Hopefully I'll pick up his trail from there.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He talks about the locket but doesn't have it on him to show the player

Text.Value: My own fault, really. I should have dropped my pack and outrun those bastards. Alas.
What, then?
Take my pack if you can find it. The only reason those goblins caught me was its weight. I'll travel lightly from now on.
This is... well... most unorthodox. So it shall be.

EditorData.NodeContext: a bit flustered, he's not used to this

Text.Value: You saved me. Now you'll extort me. That's how this works, yes?
As expected. Coercion by the book.
Yes. My reward - now.
I freed you. A little compensation would be nice.
That's not what I want.
To take without need is unprincipled. You owe me nothing, gnome.
But I still have hope. I have reason to believe he's in the Underdark. Hopefully I'll pick up his trail from there.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He shows his blood-speckled amulet to the player.

EditorData.logicalname: Alias (Greeting - Player not Drow or Duergar)

Text.Value: Compensation? Is that all? I expected worse from the likes of you.
I'm in search of a friend. I fear he's in trouble. See this? I gave it to him years ago before I left home.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He shows his blood-speckled amulet to the player.

Text.Value: Urrrgh... magga cammara - those pustulent thugs!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cinematic/actor context - the deep gnome sways dizzily
EditorData.NodeContext:
'Magga cammara' pronounced 'Mag-ah cam-ah-rah'. Gnomish exclamation meaning 'by the stones'.
Barcus the deep gnome is suffering some grogginess after spinning on the sail of a windmill for the last while.
EditorData.logicalname: Greeting - Player not Drow or Duergar

Text.Value: You owe me nothing.
Nothing?
I found it around the neck of a thug in Baldur's Gate. It was speckled with blood, my friend nowhere to be found.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: He talks about the locket but doesn't have it on him to show the player

Synopsis: The player speaks to a deep gnome after freeing him from some goblins, who'd had him tied to the sail of a windmill. The player discovers that the deep gnome travelled to the region as he learned his old friend is in danger. By way of thanks, he provides the player with the means to craft smokepowder, an explosive item. He then leaves for the Underdark in search of his friend. There, the player may encounter him again.
